mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members(membersno, id, name, passwd, tel, email, zipcode, address1, address2, rdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(membersno), 0) + 1 as membersno FROM members), #{id}, #{name}, #{passwd}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT membersno, id, name, passwd, tel, email, zipcode, address1, address2, rdate, ps FROM members ORDER BY mem_no ASC
